1556440.name: Watchman Prologue
1556440.description:
STORY:

The first chapter of Watchman takes you into the subconscious of the main heroine.

You find yourself in an old, abandoned wrestling gym. It is empty, silent… but the silence is deceiving. Soon, you realize that you are not just a night watchman—you are trapped in the distorted space of your own mind.

This abandoned gym is merely a shell. Inside, it holds fragments of the past, broken memories, and entities that conceal a terrifying truth. You must explore this unsettling world, facing what was meant to be forgotten, time and time again.
The prologue is just the beginning. Are you ready to open the door to the unknown?

FEATURES:

  • Unique experience from gameplay and atmosphere.

  • A true dive into the unconscious. Filled with important memories and images.

  • The unusual storytelling.

  • Multiple types of gameplay.

GAMEPLAY:

  • Your main duties include: to sit in your office and watch what is happening inside. It is important to realize that you are not alone here...

  • Use all the possibilities at your disposal so that no one enters your office.

  • After night shifts, you can leave your workplace. To explore this confusing and mysterious place.
1556440.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
